articles.description: The new Spider-Man: Miles Morales launched on PS5 November 12th, and features Spider-Cat (or Spider-Man the cat), an unlockable furry sidekick. As well as delivering knockout blows to Spider-Man’s foes, Spider-Cat is also confirmed to “take a pet, like no pro…
articles.content:
Filed under:
Legendary bodega dialogue unlocked
Purrfect dialogue. 
Image: via YouTube/H20Delirious
We already knew that Spider-Cat was going to be the true hero of Spider-Man: Miles Morales, but… [+1214 chars]
